title: Dongfang Bubai’s Reborn Yang Lianting - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Adultery   Ancient China   Androgynous Characters   Character Growth   Confinement   Cross-dressing   Cunning Protagonist   Death of Loved Ones   Different Social Status   Doting Love Interests   Early Romance   Eunuch   Evil Religions   Fanfiction   Fated Lovers   Flashbacks   Handsome Male Lead   Inferiority Complex   Marriage   Master-Servant Relationship   Mismatched Couple   Obsessive Love   Older Love Interests   Past Plays a Big Role   Reincarnation   Second Chance   Secret Relationship   Seme Protagonist   Straight Seme   Strong Love Interests   Unique Weapon User   Unrequited Love
author: Clever And Witty   Congming Jizhi Cai Cai Cai   聪明机智菜菜菜
description:
“The sun rises in the East, only you are invincible.”

From beginning to end, the only one Dongfang Bubai loved was Yang Lianting. In their past life, even though Yang Lianting coveted power and position, even though he never held him in his heart– But Dongfang Bubai’s love, isn’t it just like this? Falling in love with such a person means not only accepting his good, but also tolerating his evil.

Reborn Yang Lianting returned to a time when everything had yet to happen, which gives him the chance to reflect upon himself, to treat Dongfang well and to return him a lifetime filled with happiness.>
